tool.name: CRAFT
tool.description: :calculate, annotate and visualise credible SNP sets
tool.command:
## Set up output directories mkdir -p output/{regions,credible_snps,plots,annotation,bed}/ &&
## Calculate genomic regions for defined distance ruby \$CRAFT_GP_SCRIPTS/define_regions_main.rb -i "$index_snp_list" $distance_type $distance -o output/regions &&
## Collect outputs for define regions mv output_regions.txt "$output_regions" &&
## Copy the output file with a consistent name so we can use it later cp output/regions/*_boundaries_*.txt output_regions.txt &&
## Subset GWAS data python \$CRAFT_GP_SCRIPTS/filter_summary_stats.py --regions output_regions.txt --stats "$gwas_summary_stats" --out output/credible_snps/summary_stats_subset.txt &&
## Calculate credible SNP sets Rscript --vanilla \$CRAFT_GP_SCRIPTS/credible_snps_main.R -r output_regions.txt -a $number_of_cases -u $number_of_controls -s output/credible_snps/summary_stats_subset.txt -o output/credible_snps -b output/bed &&
## Collect outputs for credible SNPs mv output/credible_snps/credible_snp_list_0.99.txt "$output_snp_list" && mv output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.bed "$output_bed" && mv output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.txt "$output_txt" && mv output/credible_snps/summary_table_0.99.txt "$output_summary_table" &&
## Make the reference data available from working dir ln -s \$CRAFT_GP_DATA &&
## Annotation python \$CRAFT_GP_SCRIPTS/annotation.py --input output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.txt --output output/annotation/annotation --epi_group Blood_and_T-cell,Brain &&
## Collect outputs for annotation mv output/annotation/annotation.csv "$output_csv" && mv output/annotation/annotation.vcf "$output_vcf" && mv output/annotation/annotation.vcf_summary.html "$output_html" &&
## Visualisation Rscript --vanilla scripts/visualisation_main.R -r output/credible_snps/summary_table_0.99.txt -s output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.txt -e $epigenomes -o output/plots

param.name: name
param.label: Name for labelling output directory and files

param.name: distance_type
param.label: Specify how distance should be defined

param.name: distance
param.label: Size of region
param.help: Units are selected above; typical values for cM are 0.1 or 0.2 (DISTANCE)

param.name: number_of_cases
param.label: Number of cases in GWAS summary statistics

param.name: number_of_controls
param.label: Number of controls in GWAS summary statistics

param.name: epigenomes
param.label: Roadmap epigenomics dataset to annotate against

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Credible Refinement and Annotation of Functional Targets (CRAFT) is a pipeline for the calculation, annotation and visualisation of credible SNP sets
.. class:: infomark
**Usage**
See the GitHub site for information on usage:
https://github.com/johnbowes/CRAFT-GP
